trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"></xref> object to and from other types.
trans-unit.target: Converte un <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"> </xref> da e verso altri tipi di oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The KeyGestureConverter class only converts an instance <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> to and from a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: La classe KeyGestureConverter converte solo un'istanza <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>a e da un <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.source: The KeyGestureConverter converts to and from a <xref:System.String> using the "+" character as the delimiter between the modifier keys and the key.
trans-unit.target: Il KeyGestureConverter converte da e verso un <xref:System.String>utilizzando il carattere "+" come delimitatore tra i tasti di modifica e la chiave.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: For example, the string `Control+A` would be converted into a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, la stringa `Control+A` verrebbe convertita in una <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>con una <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A>proprietà è uguale a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>e la <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A>proprietà è uguale a <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: # # Utilizzo di testo XAML

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an object of the specified type can be converted to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"></xref>, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Determina se un oggetto del tipo specificato può essere convertito in un'istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"> </xref>, utilizzando il contesto specificato.

trans-unit.source: A format context that provides information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
trans-unit.target: Un contesto di formato che fornisce informazioni sull'ambiente dal quale viene richiamato il convertitore.

trans-unit.source: The type being evaluated for conversion.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo viene valutato la conversione.

trans-unit.target: if sourceType is type ; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"></xref> can be converted to the specified type, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Determina se un'istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"> </xref> può essere convertito nel tipo specificato, utilizzando il contesto specificato.

trans-unit.source: A format context that provides information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
trans-unit.target: Un contesto di formato che fornisce informazioni sull'ambiente dal quale viene richiamato il convertitore.

trans-unit.target: Il tipo viene valutato la conversione.

trans-unit.target: if destinationType is type ; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Attempts to convert the specified object to a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"></xref>, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Tenta di convertire l'oggetto specificato in un <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"> </xref>, utilizzando il contesto specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGestureConverter> converts to and from a <xref:System.String> using the "+" key as the delimiter between the modifier keys and the key.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGestureConverter>converte da e verso un <xref:System.String>tramite la chiave "+" come delimitatore tra i tasti di modifica e la chiave.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGestureConverter>

trans-unit.source: For example, the string `Control+A` would be converted into a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, la stringa `Control+A` verrebbe convertita in una <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>con una <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A>proprietà è uguale a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>e la <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A>proprietà è uguale a <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.target: Un contesto di formato che fornisce informazioni sull'ambiente dal quale viene richiamato il convertitore.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to convert a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"></xref> to the specified type, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Tenta di convertire un <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"> </xref> nel tipo specificato, utilizzando il contesto specificato.

trans-unit.source: `destinationType` must be <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: `destinationType`deve essere <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGestureConverter> converts to and from a <xref:System.String> using the "+" key as the delimiter between the modifier keys and the key.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGestureConverter>converte da e verso un <xref:System.String>tramite la chiave "+" come delimitatore tra i tasti di modifica e la chiave.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGestureConverter>

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> would be converted into the string `Control+A`.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, un <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>con un <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A>proprietà è uguale a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A>proprietà è uguale a <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>verrebbe convertita in stringa `Control+A`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>
